mapper.select: select * from review_f5 order by review_code desc
mapper.insert: insert into review_f5(review_code, id, review_subject, review_code, product_code, review_content, review_pw, click_cnt, star, review_image, order_detail_code) values(#{reviewCode},#{id},#{reviewSubject},#{reviewCode},#{productCode},#{reviewContent},#{reviewPw},#{clickCnt},#{star},#{reviewImage},#{orderDetailCode})
